item.description:
Bring with you photos that inspire you featuring the Spring 2011 fashions. We will meet to discuss these trends so we can plan the details for our photo session event to take place within two weeks of this event.

I would like everyone to attend as input for this session from photographers, makeup artists, models, designers and those who are new to the industry.

We will leave with:

a photo session date

event theme

location options

full concept for finished project.

new friends...(each of you).

See you there
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at Starbucks locaterd at the Marriott Cople Place
item.why: Every stylist wants to know the trends of the season. Let's meet to plan our spring trend photo session.

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Spring Fashion and Style
